articles.title: AI Tasked With Destroying Humanity Now Trying New Tactic - Futurism
articles.description: ChaosGPT — that autonomous, open-source AI agent tasked to "destroy humanity" — is still working hard to bring about the end of our species.
articles.content:
Mama didn't raise no quitter.
